name: Service Kingston – City Help Desk
summary: Contact the City of Kingston for general questions, service requests, or guidance on municipal services.
whoFor: All residents needing help navigating city services
details: Call or submit a request through the MyKingston portal for information or support about any city service.

name: Garbage & Recycling Information
summary: Find out how waste and recycling collection works in Kingston, including what goes where and when pick-up happens.
whoFor: Residents needing guidance on garbage and recycling
details: Includes waste sorting, collection schedules, garbage bag tags, and disposal of special items.

name: Household Waste Collection Rules
summary: Rules and tips for putting out garbage, organics, and recycling at the curb.
whoFor: Residents new to city waste systems
details: Learn what can go in your garbage or recycling and how to prepare your items for pick-up.

name: Kingston Waste App
summary: Mobile app to view garbage/recycling schedules, sign up for reminders, and sort waste properly.
whoFor: Residents who want reminders and help sorting waste
details: Download the Kingston Waste app on your device to get schedule notifications and waste sorting help.

name: Parking Permits & Rules
summary: Information on residential and commuter parking permits, how to apply, and related restrictions.
whoFor: Residents who need parking permits or information
details: Includes how to apply for residential or commuter permits and basic parking guideline information.

name: Kingston Transit Information
summary: Public transit service info such as planning trips, fares, schedules, and reporting issues.
details: Learn about routes, fares, lost-and-found items, and how to report service issues.

name: Kingston Community Health Centres — Settlement Services
description: Settlement supports for newcomers: orientation, referrals, and help navigating local services.
whyHelpful: Helps you understand what services exist in Kingston and how to access them.

name: KEYS Job Centre
description: Employment services including job search support, resume help, and local employer connections.
whyHelpful: Supports job searching and connecting to employment opportunities in Kingston.

name: Housing Help (City of Kingston / Community Partner)
description: Information and referral support for housing options, applications, and local housing resources.
whyHelpful: Helps you understand housing options and next steps for stable housing.
contact: Call 211 Ontario or City of Kingston housing information line (as directed).

name: Kingston Community Health Centres — Primary Care
description: Community health services, primary care, and connections to health supports.
whyHelpful: Helps you access health care and navigate local health supports.

name: Legal Aid Ontario (Referral/Intake)
description: Information on legal aid services and eligibility, including referrals and intake guidance.
whyHelpful: Can help you find legal support options and understand eligibility.

name: IRCC Information (Federal immigration information)
description: Official federal information about immigration processes and forms.
whyHelpful: Provides official, accurate information for immigration processes and status questions.

name: 211 Ontario
description: Free, confidential information and referrals to local community and social services.
whyHelpful: If you're unsure where to start, 211 can connect you to the right local services.

name: Kingston Frontenac Public Library
description: Library services including programs, information access, and community resources.
whyHelpful: A good starting point for internet access, programs, and community information.
